page.title: 03GAMES I LIKE TO PLAY
page.content: I like to play a game called{British {Bulldog.}You have one player in the middle of a big square. The other players have to run across the square and reach the other side without being caught. If you are caught you must stay in the middle with the others who are 'on'. We keep running back and forwards until everyone is caught. Another game I like to play is {table {football.}In this game there is a wooden board with sides and two teams of players on metal bars. On the end of each bar there is a handle. Twisting the handle makes the players kick the ball and pushing and pulling it moves them sideways across the table. Two or four people can play this game. There is a small football and you have to score in each others goals. Sometimes we time the games and other times its the first to 10 goals.
